Scope
The Maternal and Child Health (MCH) programme isprimarily directed at women who are pregnant, in labouror postpartum, and at the newborn, infants, andchildren.
Improvement in the health status of women and children,however, will be better achieved if a broader view ofreproductive health is adopted.  This view departs from theemphasis on antenatal, labour and delivery, postnatal,newborn and infant care to include interpregnancy, care ofolder children
